title: Full kitchen in apartment, On Las Vegas RTC bus line, Bad Credit Ok
posting_body: ['Charleston Apartments in Las Vegas', 'Low Weekly & Monthly Rates', 'FREE Utilities', 'Free Premium Cable TV', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Additional Information:', '<URL>', 'Apartment Home Features', '-No long term lease required', '-Siegel Rewards Program', '-Full kitchen in apartment', '-Bad Credit Ok', '-Free premium cable TV', '-Large studio apartments', '-Laundry facilities', '-Fully furnished and unfurnished apartments', '-Sparkling swimming pool', '-On Las Vegas RTC bus line', '-Short walk to Las Vegas Strip', '-High-speed wireless internet available', 'Free Siegel Reward Program', 'Earn points every time you pay your rent or refer a friend.', 'Use your points to treat yourself to', 'free rent, food, movies, gift cards', ', and much more!', 'Pet Policy', '20lb weight limit and aggressive breeds such as Pit Bulls and Rottweilers are prohibited.', 'Managed by The Siegel Group', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Pricing may include current special and is subject to change without notice.']
